name: Mastery Talisman: Unyielding Advance
description:
When your character uses a Skill they have already used once this Round: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
When your character uses a skill they have already used twice this Round: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
